title: User Registration Success
description: Verify that a new user can register successfully with valid email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Input a valid email address and a password that meets the minimum length (6 characters).
Submit the registration form.
Confirm that registration is successful and user is notified accordingly.

title: User Registration Input Validation
description: Verify the registration validation for invalid email and password inputs.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Input invalid email addresses (e.g., missing '@', missing domain).
Input passwords shorter than 6 characters.
Attempt to submit the registration form.
Validation errors are displayed for the email and password inputs, and registration is not submitted.

title: User Login Success
description: Verify that an existing user can log in successfully with correct credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input valid existing user email and correct password.
Submit the login form.
User is logged in successfully and redirected to the product listing or home page.

title: User Login Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login fails if incorrect email or password is entered.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input valid email but incorrect password.
Submit the login form.
Login fails, error message is shown indicating invalid credentials.

title: User Logout Success
description: Verify that an authenticated user can log out successfully.

steps.description: Log in with valid credentials.
Use the user menu to initiate logout.
User is logged out successfully and redirected to login or home page.

title: Product Catalog Displays All Products
description: Verify that the product catalog page displays all 6 pre-loaded products with correct details and images.

steps.description: Navigate to the product listing page.
All 6 products are displayed in a grid with their name, description, price, image, and category.

title: Product Details Retrieval by ID
description: Verify that product details can be fetched correctly by product ID from the backend.

steps.description: Request product details using a valid product ID.
Product details are returned correctly matching the data in the catalog.
Request product details using an invalid product ID.
System returns a 404 not found error.

title: Add Product to Shopping Cart
description: Verify that the user can add a product to the shopping cart and the cart updates in real time.

steps.description: Navigate to the product listing page.
Click the 'Add to Cart' button for a product.
Shopping cart badge on the navigation toolbar increments accordingly.
Supabase backend reflects the new cart item with correct product ID and quantity.

title: Update Cart Item Quantity
description: Verify that the user can increment or decrement the quantity of an item in the shopping cart and changes persist.

steps.description: Navigate to the shopping cart page.
Increment the quantity of a cart item.
Cart UI updates immediately showing the new quantity and recalculated total price.
Cart data in Supabase is updated to match the new quantity.
Decrement the quantity of the same cart item.
Cart updates accordingly, and if quantity reaches zero the item is removed.

title: Remove Item from Shopping Cart
description: Verify that the user can remove an item from the shopping cart and updates are persisted.

steps.description: Navigate to the shopping cart page.
Click the remove button for a cart item.
Item is removed immediately from the UI and cart totals are updated.
Supabase backend no longer contains that cart item.

title: Clear Entire Shopping Cart
description: Verify that the user can clear all items from the shopping cart at once.

steps.description: Navigate to the shopping cart page.
Click the 'Clear Cart' button.
All items are removed from the cart UI and the total price resets to zero.
Supabase backend reflects the cart cleared state.

title: Cart Totals and Badge Accuracy
description: Verify that the total price and item counts in the cart and navigation badge are calculated and displayed correctly for various item quantities.

steps.description: Add multiple products with varying quantities to the cart.
Total price displayed in the cart matches expected sum of (price * quantity) for all items.
Navigation toolbar badge accurately shows the sum of all item quantities.

title: Checkout Process Success
description: Verify that the checkout process completes successfully and clears the cart afterwards.

steps.description: Add items to the shopping cart.
Navigate to the cart page.
Initiate the checkout process.
A confirmation alert is displayed showing the total amount of the purchase.
After confirming, the cart is cleared both from UI and Supabase backend.

title: Navigation Routes Load Correct Components
description: Verify that navigation links load the correct components for products, cart, login, and registration pages with active states updated.

steps.description: Click on the 'Products' navigation link.
Product listing component loads and the link is visually marked active.
Click on the 'Cart' navigation link.
Shopping cart component loads and the link is visually marked active.
Click on the 'Login' navigation link.
Login component loads and the link is visually marked active.
Click on the 'Register' navigation link.
Registration component loads and the link is visually marked active.

title: Handle Invalid Item Update in Cart
description: Verify error handling when attempting to update the quantity of a cart item that does not exist.

steps.description: Attempt to update the quantity of a non-existent item in the cart via backend API.
System returns a 404 error indicating the item is not found.

title: Handle Removing Non-Existent Item from Cart
description: Verify error handling when attempting to remove a cart item that does not exist.

steps.description: Attempt to delete a non-existent cart item via backend API.
System returns a 404 error indicating the item is not found.
